title: #107: Mindhunter - Something or nothing?
description:
The #RCP discuss Episode #8 of the Netflix show "Mindhunter" and the case of the creepy foot tickler. The team profile Principal Wade's behaviour: is it something or nothing?

Professor Wendy Carr (played by Anna Torv), expresses outright confusion. “I can’t imagine why you would go after a respected school principal with no history of abuse,” she says. 

But what do our profilers conclude? We discuss the role of age appropriate and healthy relationships education with children and the importance of early identification, intervention and prevention. 


#HomicidePrevention
